text: Hi from Sweden! :wave::relaxed: Thanks for letting me join you guys, new in HubSpot so looking forward to learn alot from you :hugging_face:
Hi everyone, getting started with HubSpot for my developer job.

Hiiii <@UDANT4TPZ> and welcome to the CMS developer community! What's your background?

Do you have any specific questions about coding on HubSpot CMS?
Welcome! We're excited to have you. What is your development background? Have you coded on other CMS/systems?

Hi Luke, I’ve actually only recently switched career. I was a Key Account Manager in Automotive not too long ago. I did a 3 month intensive training in frontend development with focus on JS and React.js. Now I got my first dev job and I’m responsible for the companies new website, built in HubSpot. Except for a little wordpress I have no experience with CMS.
